verses.verse: So when David <S%H1732><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> and full <S%H7646><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>, he made Solomon <S%H8010><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And he gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, with the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%>.

Now the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were numbered <S%H5608><s%> from the age <S%H1121><s%> of thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>: and their number <S%H4557><s%> by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, man by man <S%H1397><s%>, was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

Of which <S%H428><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were to set forward <S%H5329><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were officers <S%H7860><s%> and judges <S%H8199><s%>:

Moreover four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> were porters <S%H7778><s%>; and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> praised <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with the instruments <S%H3627><s%> which I made <S%H6213><s%>, said David <S%H1984><s%>, to praise with it.

And David <S%H1732><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> them into courses <S%H4256><s%> among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, namely <S%H1648><s%>, Gershon, Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, and Merari <S%H4847><s%>.
Of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> were <S%H3936><s%>, Laadan, and Shimei <S%H8096><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Laadan <S%H3936><s%>; the chief <S%H7218><s%> was Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>, and Zetham <S%H2241><s%>, and Joel <S%H3100><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei <S%H8096><s%>; Shelomith <S%H8019><s%>, and Haziel <S%H2381><s%>, and Haran <S%H2039><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>. These were the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Laadan <S%H3936><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei <S%H8096><s%> were <S%H3189><s%>, Jahath, Zina <S%H2126><s%>, and Jeush <S%H3266><s%>, and Beriah <S%H1283><s%>. These four <S%H702><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei <S%H8096><s%>.

And Jahath <S%H3189><s%> was the chief <S%H7218><s%>, and Zizah <S%H2125><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>: but Jeush <S%H3266><s%> and Beriah <S%H1283><s%> had not many <S%H7235><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>; therefore they were in one <S%H259><s%> reckoning <S%H6486><s%>, according to their father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>; Amram <S%H6019><s%>, Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>, four <S%H702><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%>; Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> was separated <S%H914><s%>, that he should sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, he and his sons <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> unto him <S%H1288><s%>, and to bless in his name <S%H8034><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Now concerning Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, his sons <S%H1121><s%> were named <S%H7121><s%> of the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> were <S%H1647><s%>, Gershom, and Eliezer <S%H461><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom <S%H1647><s%>, Shebuel <S%H7619><s%> was the chief <S%H7218><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliezer <S%H461><s%> were <S%H7345><s%>, Rehabiah the chief <S%H7218><s%>. And Eliezer <S%H461><s%> had none other <S%H312><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>; but the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%> were very <S%H4605><s%> many <S%H7235><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>; Shelomith <S%H8019><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>.

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%>; Jeriah <S%H3404><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%>, Amariah <S%H568><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>, and Jekameam <S%H3360><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>; Michah <S%H4318><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%>, and Jesiah <S%H3449><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>; Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>. The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mahli <S%H4249><s%>; Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, and Kish <S%H7027><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and had no sons <S%H1121><s%>, but daughters <S%H1323><s%>: and their brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> took them <S%H5375><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi <S%H4187><s%>; Mahli <S%H4249><s%>, and Eder <S%H5740><s%>, and Jeremoth <S%H3406><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>.

These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>; even the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>, as they were counted <S%H6485><s%> by number <S%H4557><s%> of names <S%H8034><s%> by their polls <S%H1538><s%>, that did <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, from the age <S%H1121><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>.

For David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>, that they may live <S%H7931><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>:
And also unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; they shall no more carry <S%H5375><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, nor any vessels <S%H3627><s%> of it for the service there <S%H5656><s%>.

For by the last <S%H314><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were numbered <S%H4557><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and above <S%H4605><s%>:

Because their office <S%H4612><s%> was to wait <S%H3027><s%> on the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in the courts <S%H2691><s%>, and in the chambers <S%H3957><s%>, and in the purifying <S%H2893><s%> of all holy things <S%H6944><s%>, and the work <S%H4639><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>;

Both for the showbread <S%H3899><s%>, and for the fine flour <S%H5560><s%> for food offering <S%H4503><s%>, and for the unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H7550><s%>, and for that which is baked in the pan <S%H4227><s%>, and for that which is fried <S%H7246><s%>, and for all manner of measure <S%H4884><s%> and size <S%H4060><s%>;
And to stand <S%H5975><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%> to thank <S%H3034><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and likewise at even <S%H6153><s%>;

And to offer <S%H5927><s%> all burnt sacrifices <S%H5930><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, in the new moons <S%H2320><s%>, and on the set feasts <S%H4150><s%>, by number <S%H4557><s%>, according to the order <S%H4941><s%> commanded unto them <S%H8548><s%>, continually before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

And that they should keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place <S%H4931><s%>, and the charge of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> their brothers <S%H251><s%>, in the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
